text: If your hand causes you to sin, cut it off. It is better for you to enter life crippled than to have two hands and go into hell,9:43 Greek Gehenna; also in verses 45 and 47 into the unquenchable fire.9:43 BYZ and TR include 44 where their worm never dies, and the fire is never quenched; see verse 48 and Isaiah 66:24.
